name: MCP 服务器 图表

name: Playwright MCP
author: Microsoft Corporation
description: Playwright MCP 是一个提供浏览器自动化功能的 Model Context Protocol (MCP) 服务器

name: Memory Server MCP

description: A MCP server for persistent memory storage with advanced features like tagging, timestamping, expiration
use_cases: Persistent memory storage for AI interactions

name: OpenAlex MCP 服务器
author: reetp14

name: 掘金MCP服务器

description: MCP服务器提供面向掘金内容的智能分析能力，配备34种专业工具，包括内容检索、智能推荐、趋势分析和用户互动
